bcbioRNASeq
  • Reference

Top Tables of Differential Expression Results

Top Tables of Differential Expression Results

topTables(object, ...)

# S4 method for list
topTables(object, n = 50L, coding = FALSE)

Arguments

object

resultsTables() return list.
...

Additional arguments.
n

Number genes to report.
coding

Whether to only return coding genes.

Value

kable.

See also

Other R Markdown Functions: prepareRNASeqTemplate

Examples

load(system.file("extdata/bcb_small.rda", package = "bcbioRNASeq"))
load(system.file("extdata/res_small.rda", package = "bcbioRNASeq"))

# DESeqResults to list ====
resTbl <- resultsTables(
    object = res_small,
    rowData = rowData(bcb_small),
    summary = FALSE,
    write = FALSE
)
topTables(resTbl, n = 5L)
#> 
#> 
#> |geneID             | baseMean|lfc  |padj      |geneName |geneBiotype    |description                           |
#> |:------------------|--------:|:----|:---------|:--------|:--------------|:-------------------------------------|

#> |ENSMUSG00000029304 |    69931|5.39 |1.83e-78  |Spp1     |protein_coding |secreted phosphoprotein 1             |
#> |ENSMUSG00000003617 |     3543|4.13 |2.44e-51  |Cp       |protein_coding |ceruloplasmin                         |
#> |ENSMUSG00000022037 |     3515|3.57 |1.92e-42  |Clu      |protein_coding |clusterin                             |
#> |ENSMUSG00000040405 |     3002|3.82 |7.11e-41  |Havcr1   |protein_coding |hepatitis A virus cellular receptor 1 |
#>

#> |ENSMUSG00000028713 |    14427|-1.60 |6.64e-11 |Cyp4b1   |protein_coding |cytochrome P450, family 4, subfamily b, polypeptide 1              |
